column2: I'm not sure how or why the hosts would not have assisted you to your seat
column3: so I am looking into that. Secondly
column4: your server should not have just told you "I don't know." That is not our policy
column5: and I am asking all of my servers to identify the culprit. That is unacceptable. Our servers should be well-versed on our menu
column6: and if they don't know the answer to a question
column7: they are trained to find out.
